name: Sonic Heroes
overview: Sonic & the gang are back in their latest game, SONIC HEROES. Coming out on the Gamecube and for the first time on Playstation 2, Xbox, and PC! Sonic Heroes has a new twist to the gameplay allowing you to choose a team of 3 characters with different strengths. There are 4 teams to choose from: TEAM SONIC - Sonic, Tails, & Knuckles, TEAM DARK - Shadow, Rouge, & E-123 Omega, TEAM CHAOTIX - Espio, Vector, &, Charmy Bee, and TEAM ROSE - Amy, Big, & Cream with her Chao sidekick Cheese. There are 4 modes, Story mode, Challenge mode, Tutorial modes, & the new & improved battle mode for multiplayer fun. On top of that there are plenty of secrets to unlock.
